CustomField.description: If Rest Break in progress, completed, or could not be completed and duration is less that 30 mins, then it is in voilation
CustomField.formula: IF( AND( Work_Order__r.IsRestBreak__c, OR(TEXT(Status) == 'Completed', TEXT(Status) == 'Cannot Complete', TEXT(Status) == 'In Progress')), IF( Actual_Duration__c < 30, true, false), false )
CustomField.label: Rest Break Violation
